 boolean enoughToFilter()

setThreshold

public void setThreshold(int threshold)

performCompletion

public void performCompletion()
We override this method to avoid an extra onItemClick being called on the drop-down's OnItemClickListener by AutoCompleteTextView#onKeyUp(int, KeyEvent) when an item is clicked with the trackball.

onWindowFocusChanged

public void onWindowFocusChanged(boolean hasWindowFocus)
We override this method to be sure and show the soft keyboard if appropriate when the TextView has focus.

enoughToFilter

public boolean enoughToFilter()
We override this method so that we can allow a threshold of zero, which ACTV does not.

                           KeyEvent event)
